entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16 except minus 23 inland.
